title: Renault Kwid RXL 1.0L SCe launched in India at Rs 3.54 lakh : New Launches, News - India Today
text:
Renault Kwid RXL 1.0L SCe launched in India at Rs 3.54 lakh IndiaToday.in | New Delhi, February 23, 2017 | Edited by Pratik Rakshit | UPDATED 15:37 IST Picture for representational purpose only 
Renault India on Thursday announced the introduction of a new KWID RXL 1.0L SCe (Smart Control efficiency) variant, which will be offered in both manual transmission and Automated Manual Transmission (AMT). 
Price: 
The new Kwid RXL 1.0L SCe variant in manual transmission will start at an introductory price of Rs 3.54 Lakh (ex showroom, New Delhi) while the Kwid 0.8 litre version will be priced at 3.76 lakh (ex showroom, New Delhi). The KWID RXL 1.0 L AMT variant will start at an introductory price of Rs 3.84 Lakh (ex showroom, New Delhi) and Rs 4.14 lakh (ex showroom, New Delhi) for the 1.0 L MT variant. 
Engine: 
The 1.0 litre Renault Kwid SCe engine is optimally designed for better performance. The 4 valves per cylinder of the Double Over Head Camshaft (DOHC) layout ensures low pressure drop and super-efficient valve lift for a higher air filling; thus allowing the engine to make usable power at low end, mid-range and high-end rev bands. This high technology engine offers excellent drivability, be it slick city streets or on the highway. 
Renault Kwid 1.0L SCe will also feature new Speed -Sport designer graphics on the doors, and two-tone gloss grey ORVMs, enhancing its style quotient. 
Transmission: 
The Easy-R Gear Box is a 5-speed Automated Manual Transmission (AMT) technology derived from Renault's rich and successful expertise in Formula 1. It enables a clutch free driving experience that combines the fuel economy and performance of a manual transmission with the convenience of automated gear shifting. 
Safety Features: 
Apart from several active and passive safety equipment, Renault KWID already comes with the option of the driver airbag. Additionally, KWID offers first-in-class pro-sense seat belt pre-tensioners with load limiters, an important safety feature that is usually offered in upper segment cars.
